summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through different environments. Initially, it is in an urban area with parked cars and buildings. Later, it transitions to a rural road with clear skies. Towards the end, a collision occurs involving a motorcycle and a person on the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is driving at a consistent speed initially. As it transitions to the rural road, it maintains its speed. However, upon encountering the collision scene, the vehicle decelerates rapidly to avoid further impact.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcycle, approximately 10 meters away, involved in a collision, lying on the road. 2) Front: A person, approximately 12 meters away, lying on the road, possibly injured from the collision.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a truck, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection with a red traffic light. A white sedan is on the left side, a truck is ahead, and a motorcyclist is on the right side. The truck is moving forward, and the motorcyclist is approaching the intersection from the right side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down as it approaches the intersection with a red traffic light. The truck ahead is moving forward, and the motorcyclist on the right side is approaching the intersection.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving forward. 2) Front: A truck, approximately 5 meters away, moving forward. 3) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 3 meters away, approaching the intersection.

characters: Driver of a white van, motorcyclist, pedestrians
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection with a green traffic light. A white van is on the left side, and a motorcyclist is crossing the intersection from the right side. Several pedestrians are also crossing the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down as it approaches the intersection. The vehicle is maintaining a cautious speed due to the presence of the motorcyclist and pedestrians crossing the road.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white van, approximately 2 meters away, moving forward and potentially merging into the lane. 2) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the intersection. 3) Front: Several pedestrians, approximately 10 meters away, crossing the road.

characters: Driver of a white van, motorcyclists, pedestrians
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection with a red traffic light. A white van is moving from the left side towards the center of the intersection. Several motorcyclists are waiting at the intersection, and pedestrians are crossing the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down as it approaches the intersection with a red traffic light. The vehicle maintains a steady speed to ensure safety and avoid collision with the white van moving from the left side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white van, approximately 5 meters away, moving towards the center of the intersection, potentially causing a cut-in. 2) Front: Motorcyclists, approximately 10 meters away, waiting at the intersection. 3) Front: Pedestrians, approximately 15 meters away, crossing the road.
